title: Skin Giveaway every 3 wins in a row

embed.description: Pick smart, Build Smart, Play Smart.

body:
Currently Plat, working my way up to Diamond. 

Every three wins in a row I gift a skin to a random viewer. Only rules is that you: 

1. have to be active in chat when the giveaway happens
2. are on either NA or EUW servers. 
3. skin value of 1350 or less.
